Compatibility

Zelix KlassMaster is written entirely in Java 1.2 and technically should run on any platform that supports a 1.2 (or better) Virtual Machine. However differences in the file systems and GUIs can cause problems. Also, Zelix KlassMaster's flow obfuscation technology can expose bugs in some Just in Time (JIT) compilers. It has been tested on:
  • Windows XP ™ using
    • Sun JDK 1.5.0-b64 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build build 1.5.0-b64 and HotSpot(TM) Server VM build 1.5.0-b64
    • Sun JDK 1.4.2_04-b05 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build 1.4.2_04-b05 and HotSpot(TM) Server VM build 1.4.2_04-b05
    • Sun JDK 1.3.1_11-b02 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build 1.3.1_11-b02 and HotSpot(TM) Server VM build 1.3.1_09-b02
    • Sun JDK JDK-1.2.2_017
    • BEA WebLogic JRockit(TM) 1.4.2_04 JVM (build ari-31788-20040616-1132-win-ia32)
  • Solaris 9 using
    • Sun JDK 1.5.0-b64 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build 1.5.0-b64 and HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM build 1.5.0-b64
    • Sun JDK 1.4.2_04-b05 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build 1.4.2_04-b05 and HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM build 1.4.2_04-b05
    • Sun JDK 1.3.1-11-b03 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build 1.3.1-11-b02 and HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM build 1.3.1-11-b02
  • Linux (RedHat 8.0) using
    • Sun JDK JDK 1.5.0-b64 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM 1.5.0-b64 and HotSpot(TM) Server VM build 1.5.0-b64
    • Sun JDK 1.4.2_04-b05 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build 1.4.2_04-b05 and HotSpot(TM) Server VM build 1.4.2_04-b05
    • Sun JDK 1.3.1_11 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM build 1.3.1_11-b02 and HotSpot(TM) Server VM build 1.3.1_11-b02
    • IBM JDK 1.4.1 build cxia321411-20040301
  • Mac OS X 10.3 using
    • build 1.4.1_01-99.3 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM 1.4.1_01-27
    • build 1.4.2_04-131 with HotSpot(TM) Client VM 1.4.2-36
Also note that Zelix KlassMaster:
  • will not run on the Microsoft VM because it does not support Java 1.2
